summary: This document appears to be a corporate filing related to the incorporation of a business entity in the Virgin Islands. It outlines the structure and powers of the corporation, including the management and governance by a board of directors. The document is marked as confidential under federal rules.

persons.name: Ena Simon
persons.context: Ena Simon is mentioned as a director in the context of the corporation's management structure.

persons.name: Mary R. Weber
persons.context: Mary R. Weber is also mentioned as a director in the context of the corporation's management structure.

locations: 146-100 Anna's Retreat, St. Thomas, Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document outlines the articles of incorporation for a corporation in the Virgin Islands.
It specifies that the corporation is to have perpetual existence and unlimited indebtedness.
The management structure includes a board of directors, which must consist of at least three members.
Directors of the corporation are not required to be stockholders.
The document is marked as confidential under federal rules.
